title: 2 for 1 rune page gifting
body:
Hi I was wondering what happens if you gift a rune page during the 2 for 1 sale. Will the recipient get 2 pages or just the 1.

Thanks.

replies.body: We're still not able to gift bundles, and since the 2 for 1 is technically a bundle, you won't be able to gift it.
Thanks for the reply, I knew this was the issue back in May; sad to hear it is still the same.
